trans-unit.source: Represents a row of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> that can contain controls.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en rad i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> som kan inneholde kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> class, specifying the containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> klasse, angir inneholdende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inneholdende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen og plasseringen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>, inkludert nonclient elementene, i piksler i forhold til den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control, the Bounds property gets the nonclient and client elements.
trans-unit.target: Mens den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A>egenskapen får bare klienten elementer kontrollens, område-egenskapen henter nonclient og klient-elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be dragged and dropped into a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> kan drar og slettes i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be dragged and dropped into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> drar og slippes til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is enough space in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> to receive the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det er nok plass i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> å motta den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the controls in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrollene den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of controls.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter plassen, i piksler, som er angitt som standard mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer standard avstanden mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den interne mellomrommet på innholdet i en kontroll i piksler.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer det interne mellomrommet over innholdet i en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter visningsområdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements, the DisplayRectangle property gets only the client elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: Mens den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A>egenskapen får nonclient og klienten elementer, egenskapen DisplayRectangle henter bare klienten elementer kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Henter en forekomst av kontrollens oppsettet motoren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> for kontrollens innhold.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer avstanden mellom kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnBoundsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnBoundsChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The original value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den opprinnelige verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnControlAdded method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnControlAdded kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The control that was added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen ble lagt til i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the added control.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som representerer plasseringen av tillagt kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnControlRemoved method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnControlRemoved kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The control that was removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen ble fjernet fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index representing the position of the removed control.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen som representerer posisjonen for den fjernede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnLayout method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnLayout kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnOrientationChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnOrientationChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the layout direction of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> relative to its containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter sorteringsretningen oppsettet av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> i forhold til den som inneholder <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utfyllingen i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> som representerer kontrollens interne mellomrommet egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref>.
